author: Jenny Kang
title: Return of A Beloved Drinking Show Now Divides Viewers Amid Recent DUI Scandal - Koreaboo
text:
On August 8, 2024 (KST), rapper Lee Young Ji shared an exciting tweetâ€”and other social media updatesâ€”announcing the return of her beloved YouTube show, My Alcohol Diary (also known as No Prepare ).

Lee Young Jiâ€™s â€œNo Prepareâ€ Is Reportedly Gearing Up For Season 3
So, naturally, some viewers celebrated Lee Young Jiâ€™s tweet confirming the return. Idol fans, and even celebrities themselves, flocked to the comments signing up to guest on the next season.

On the other hand, though, some viewers expressed uncertaintyâ€”especially given the â€œtimingâ€ of recent DUI scandal involving the BTS member Suga .
| theqoo â€œThe timing, though.â€ â€œDear Young Jiâ€¦ I like My Alcohol Diary , but how about postponing or drinking tea instead?â€ â€œIt didnâ€™t even seem like she drinks well, so I wish she wouldnâ€™t drink for the sake of her healthâ€¦â€ â€œIâ€™d prefer it if she ate food instead of drinking alcohol.â€ â€œIâ€™d say her show is the original sool-bang , but there are too many drinking shows now. Itâ€™s harmful. It should be restricted to 19+.â€ â€œIs she obtuseâ€¦? People have been talking because of the DUI scandal that broke a day before. Young Ji is generally a good person, but she simply will not listen when the topic of drinking comes up. Maybe because My Alcohol Diary is so popular.â€ â€œStop with the drinking shows already.â€ â€œNo, no. Stop with the alcohol!â€ â€œUgh, I hate drinking shows.â€ â€œI mean, an age restriction would solve the problem rather than removing the content itself. There are countless more problematic shows out there, but it feels like Young Jiâ€™s show is being targeted right now. If this is to be removed, YouTube would have to remove all alcohol-related content on the platform. Is that possible?â€ â€œThe show name doesnâ€™t even include alcohol, but drinking seems to be almost its identityâ€¦ Why? How about just eating foodâ€¦? Like people doâ€¦ Or drinking coffee or traditional tea would be nice, too.â€ â€œYoung Ji is NOT the one who caused trouble after drinking, so why are people picking on her show?â€ â€œCan she not host the show if she doesnâ€™t get drunk?â€ Over the years, in general, Korea has seen concerns be raised over the increasing popularity of drinking shows.
Concerns Are Raised Over The Increasing Popularity Of Idol Drinking Shows
Meanwhile, an episode of My Alcohol Diary featuring a girl group member was crowned the top-ranking YouTube video in Korea for 2023. Read more about it here:
The Top-Ranking YouTube Video In Korea For 2023 Features A K-Pop Idol
Source: theqoo
